alert.note: Alert for Hill County; Northern Blaine County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 13 at 8:40PM MST until January 14 at 12:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO NOON MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...A mix of rain and freezing rain is expected late tonight through Saturday morning. A glaze to a tenth of an inch of ice accumulation will be possible. * WHERE...Hill County and Northern Blaine County. * WHEN...From 3 AM to Noon MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Slippery roads and other surfaces where a light glaze of ice accumulates. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light rain showers will develop late tonight and continue through Saturday morning. Air temperatures will be near or above freezing but icing will still be possible due recent cold and still sub-freezing ground temperatures.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.
